name: Ultimate Flustered Night
description:
For more information, visit darrytdm.com

Ultimate Flustered Night is an action packed and peculiar Dating Simulator created by DarryTDM (a group of 3 dickheads making something cos they're bored (spinno, Tango and Cillit Bang)).
Featuring an intriguing plot/story, "comedic" lines, and fully voice acted characters!

Leading up to release of UFN, there has been a miniature ARG (alternate reality game) taking place in a fictional town named Balamory, hosted on https://www.balamoryhigh.co.uk. This game may shed some light on the story told during the month long ARG and what has come of it. If you aren't sure on what happened in the ARG then visit Here, it includes all pages leading to release and may even hide more in the future.

Too bad the story has come to its demise.

...right? ;)
